## Problem Statement

Clearly describe the problem this proposal intends to address.


## Proposed Change

Describe the exact modification being proposed to the specification.


## Risk Analysis

What risks does this change mitigate?
What new risks could it introduce?


## Impact Assessment

- Affects schema? (Yes/No)
- Affects governance model? (Yes/No)
- Backward compatible? (Yes/No)


## Rationale

Why is this change necessary at this stage?


## Additional Context

Provide any relevant references, prior discussions, or implementation considerations.
